abstract: Libre Initiative is multimillion-dollar effort bankrolled by conservative billionaires David and Charles Koch designed to woo Hispanic voters to Republican side; group, through increased outreach, is promoting theme that economic freedom and smaller government will produce opportunity and prosperity in effort to change voter demographics; Democrats had won Latino vote in 2014 congressional races nationally 62 percent to 36 percent.
lead_paragraph: Tapping some Democratic strategies, the Libre Initiative seeks to win over Hispanics by promoting economic freedom and smaller-government principles.

headline.main: Koch Brothers Woo Hispanic Voters With Turkeys and Questionnaires
headline.print_headline: Effort by Kochs Seeks to Attract Hispanic Voters

snippet: Tapping some Democratic strategies, the Libre Initiative seeks to win over Hispanics by promoting economic freedom and smaller-government principles.
